name: Lifecast
description:
Still trying to find the right combination of dice to show your health? Jotting down every change on a notepad? Lifecast gets out of your way so you can focus on winning the game not counting your health.

Counting counters:
Lifecast comes with built in Poison, Energy, Planeswalker, Experience counters, and four custom counters so you'll always be on top of your game.

Game in style. Your style:
New deck? New mood? Lifecast comes with different themes so you'll always be able to find the style to fit your game.

Every format for any game:
Lifecast supports all the formats you might want to play: Standard, Modern, Commander, Brawl, and even Two-Headed Giant.
